content: I have a document that has references from one Composition section to another. I can't see in the guidance on Narrative on how to accomplish this. There is a section on linking between Data and Narrative but that is between a Narrative and an element in a resource so I'm not sure if that would be the right way to link between section narratives.
You mean an existing CDA document? I wasn't aware that was even possible...
it's actually an existing SPL document but I think the concept would be the same. Each Section has an ID and you can use that ID to reference it from Section.text.
